name: Play Ludo with friends in figma!
description:
Have some fun with your friends by playing Ludo together!


Prerequisites:

  • Everyone need to install the Dice plugin to roll the dice, You can get the plugin from here https://www.figma.com/community/plugin/821454917506828941/Dice
  • Right click anywhere on the "Game Board" page and plugins -> Dice -> Roll 1 Dice
  • Have Fun!
